summary: Contoso Wireless offers high-speed internet access with a secure router and modem, as well as 24/7 customer service. Prices vary depending on location and connection speed, and there are various discounts available for seniors, military personnel, students, and families. Payment options include credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, direct deposit, check, and cash payments. Payment plans are also available with both monthly and quarterly payment options. Customers can also save money by signing up for auto-pay, bundling services, taking advantage of promotional offers or using coupon codes.
